title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.10 - Recreation facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.10 - Recreation facilities

State Regulations
(a) Adequacy. Adequate recreation facilities shall be provided or made
available for the children under care of the institution. (b) Compliance with laws. All State and local laws, ordinances, rules and
regulations pertaining to construction, operation and maintenance of swimming
pools and recreational facilities shall be observed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
442.10

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
